Kakkata：1．Kakkata．-An eminent monk mentioned，withCāla，Upacāla，Kalimbha，Nikata andKatissaha，as staying with the Buddha at theKūtāgārasālā inVesāli．When the Licchavis started coming there to pay their respects to the Buddha，the monks，desiring solitude，went into the woodlands near by，such as theGosingasālavana．A．v．133f．

2．Kakkata．-A lay disciple of Nādikā （Ñatikā） mentioned with several others （S．v．138）．He is evidently identical with Kakudha （1）．
